kb3.name: kb3_inv_detail
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_inv_detail` ( `ind_kll_id` int(6) NOT NULL, `ind_timestamp` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `ind_plt_id` int(6) NOT NULL, `ind_sec_status` float NOT NULL default 0, `ind_all_id` int(3) NOT NULL, `ind_crp_id` int(5) NOT NULL, `ind_shp_id` int(3) NOT NULL, `ind_wep_id` int(5) NOT NULL, `ind_order` int(2) NOT NULL default 0, `ind_dmgdone` int(11) NOT NULL default 0, PRIMARY KEY (`ind_kll_id`, `ind_order`), KEY `timestamp` (`ind_timestamp`), KEY `ind_crp_id` (`ind_crp_id`), KEY `ind_all_id` (`ind_all_id`), KEY `ind_plt_time` (`ind_plt_id`,`ind_timestamp`), KEY `ind_kll_plt` (`ind_kll_id`,`ind_plt_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
